data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
The Board has subject to the approval of the Shareholders of the Company approved the re-appointment of:

a) Mr. Sujit Kumar Varma (DIN: 09075212) as an Independent Director of the Company for the second term of five consecutive years commencing with effect from 14th February 2026 to 13th February 2031 (both days inclusive).
 
b) Mr. Ghyanendra Nath Bajpai (DIN: 00946138) as an Independent Director of the Company for the second term of five consecutive years commencing with effect from 17th April 2026 to 16th April 2031 (both days inclusive).
 
c) Mrs. Rashmi Verma (DIN: 01993918) as an Independent Woman Director of the Company for the second term of five consecutive years commencing with effect from 26th May 2026 to 25th May 2031 (both days inclusive

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body: We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 14th February 2025 inter-alia considered and approved the issuance of Corporate Guarantees in relation to the Subsidiaries of the Company to secure the finance facilities to be availed by them from lenders.

data.caption: Disclosure Under Regulation 30 Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on 14th February 2025 inter-alia considered and approved the following:

a.    Considered and approved setting up of a recycling unit of PET bottles and mixed plastics at Noida.

b.   Considered and taken note of setting up of new manufacturing facility by wholly owned subsidiary of the Company viz. Uflex Woven Bags SA. De. C.V. Mexico.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
1) Approved the Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter & year ended 31st March, 2022

2) Recommended a Dividend of Rs.3/- per equity share of Rs.10/- each (30%) for the financial year ended 31st March, 2022.

3) The Board has appointed M/s. Vijay Sehgal & Company, Chartered Accountants, Delhi as Joint Statutory Auditors of the Company

4) Consider and took note of the proposed Greenfield expansion of the Company at Panipat in Haryana.
